description:
Tatsuya is a third year student at the middle school section of the Seifuu Private Academy and the student body president. He is the school idol who is also the president of the model club. He is a prodigy at producing Gundam plastic models and battling. He has such great ability that he even participated in the Gundam plastic model championship. His other name is The Crimson Comet.
Source: ANN
name: Yuuki Tatsuya
